doc:
Flora Robson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flora_Robson 0 Dame Flora McKenzie Robson, (28 March 1902 – 7 July 1984) was an English actress and star of the theatrical stage and cinema, particularly renowned for her performances in plays demanding dramatic and emotional intensity. Her range extended from queens to murderesses. Dame_Flora_McKenzie_Robson , ( 28_March_1902 – 7_July_1984 ) was an_English_actress_and_star of the_theatrical_stage_and_cinema , particularly_renowned for her_performances in plays demanding dramatic_and_emotional_intensity . Her_range extended from queens to murderesses .
